meanings.definition: To live in a particular place.
meanings.sent1: Many families reside in our neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: I reside in a small town near the mountains.
meanings.sent3: The friendly cat decided to reside in our backyard.
meanings.sent4: Happiness seems to always reside in this cozy home.
meanings.sent5: Birds of various colors reside in the lush forest.

meanings.definition: To be present as a permanent member or employee.
meanings.sent1: The loyal employee will reside in the company for many years.
meanings.sent2: I currently reside as a staff member at the local library.
meanings.sent3: The hardworking squirrel decided to reside in the park as a permanent resident.
meanings.sent4: Dedication and commitment always reside in a successful team.
meanings.sent5: The spirit of teamwork resides in every member of the orchestra.

meanings.sent1: Kindness and generosity reside in her heart.
meanings.sent2: The beauty of nature resides in every flower.
meanings.sent3: Laughter and joy seem to reside in this silly hat.
meanings.sent4: The secret to success often resides in hard work and perseverance.
meanings.sent5: The magic of friendship resides in the bond between the two friends.
